Text: online compliance trainingJames My name is Pat Brandt and I work for the Legal Research Center LRC in Minneapolis As you may know we are the nations leading provider of outsourced legal research and writing services Recently we have entered into a strategic business alliance with Integrity Interactive Corporation IIC to offer industryleading online compliance training training that could help Enron save millions in the event of a DOJ prosecution LRCs role in this alliance is to provide the legal research content for the compliance courses and assist in the marketing and selling of the IIC product You can view our compliance modules at work or home as long as you have access to the internet and a personal access code To receive an access code or more information please call or send me a reply email Thank you for your time and have a great day Sincerely Patrick C Brandt Esq eCompliance Sales Director Legal Research Center Midland Square Second Avenue South Minneapolis MN

Online Compliance TrainingHi Jeffrey My name is Pat Brandt and I am the Vice President of our ETraining Group here at the Legal Research Center LRC As you may know we are the nations leading provider of outsourced legal research and writing services In fact LRC was recently named the nd bestperforming small public company in Minnesota In addition to legal research and writing services we also offer industryleading online compliance training training that could help your organization in the event of a DOJ prosecution You can view our compliance modules at work or home as long as you have access to the internet and a personal access code To receive an access code or more information please call or send me a reply email Thank you for your time and have a great day Sincerely Patrick C Brandt Vice President eTraining Group Legal Research Center Inc Fourth Avenue South Flour Exchange Minneapolis MN
